hero.title: The New Definition of Textile Excellence
hero.subtitle: Blending modern technology with aesthetics, we produce sustainable fabrics that shape the fashion of tomorrow.

about.title: Reliable Textile Production Since 1999
about.description: OZTAYTEKS is a textile company operating in fabric production and supply since 1999. Our years of experience bring stability, quality, and continuity to our production processes.
about.description_2: Our products are manufactured according to established quality standards from raw material to final control. We contribute to the production processes of businesses of various scales as a reliable supplier with functional, balanced, and long-lasting fabric solutions.
about.description_3: Thanks to our current production infrastructure and planned work approach, we offer timely delivery and consistent quality. For OZTAYTEKS, partnership is not just about supplying products, but a long-term relationship built on continuity and mutual trust.

products.title: Production Expertise
products.subtitle: In our facility equipped with high technology, we offer superior quality in both knitted and woven fabrics.
products.knitted_desc: Single jersey, Interlock, Salerno, and more. Our knitted fabric collection, offering flexibility, softness, and comfort, fully adapts to modern fashion trends and high durability requirements.
products.woven_desc: Viscose, Cotton, and special blends. With its tightly woven structure, durability, and flawless touch, our woven fabrics make elegance and quality felt in every meter.
products.printed_desc: With digital and rotary printing options, we bring an unlimited world of colors and patterns to the fabric. Original designs and vibrant colors bring life to your collections.

knitted_fabrics.title: Knitted Fabric Types
knitted_fabrics.description: At OZTAYTEKS, we lead the ready-to-wear sector with our knitted fabric collection produced at the highest quality standards. Our fabrics prepared with weft and warp knitting techniques offer both comfort and durability.

suprem.name: Single Jersey (Suprem)
suprem.desc: A lightweight, breathable, and flexible type of knitted fabric commonly used in daily wear and t-shirt production.

lycra_suprem.name: Lycra Single Jersey
lycra_suprem.desc: Elastane-enhanced single jersey fabric, preferred for products that fit the body and offer freedom of movement.

rib.name: Rib (Ribana)
rib.desc: Rib fabrics with high elasticity and strong shape retention are generally used in collars, cuffs, and underwear.

kaşkorse.name: Interlock Rib (2x2 Rib)
kaşkorse.desc: A type of rib preferred in tank tops, bodies, and flexible clothing products with its thick and durable structure.

interlok.name: Interlock
interlok.desc: A durable, smooth-surfaced type of knitted fabric with a double-layered and full structure. Often used in baby and outerwear products.

pike.name: Pique Knit
pike.desc: A type of fabric preferred in polo shirts and summer products thanks to its porous structure and high air permeability.

french_terry.name: French Terry
french_terry.desc: A knitted fabric widely used in sweatshirt and tracksuit production, keeping warm with its looped interior structure.

two_thread.name: Two-Thread Fleece
two_thread.desc: Used in daily and sportswear products with its medium thickness, soft texture, and comfortable structure.

polar.name: Polar Fleece
polar.desc: Preferred in winter products with its high thermal insulation, lightweight, and soft textured structure.

scuba.name: Scuba (Diving Fabric)
scuba.desc: A thick, flexible, and full structured knitted fabric used in modern designs with high shape retention.

punto_roma.name: Punto Roma
punto_roma.desc: A type of knitted fabric used in products such as trousers, skirts, and jackets with its durable, smooth surface and flexible structure.

raschel.name: Raschel
raschel.desc: A durable knitted fabric offering wide pattern options, used in mesh, lace, and technical textile products.

tricot.name: Tricot
tricot.desc: Suitable for underwear, sportswear, and technical usage areas with its smooth surface and lightweight structure.

woven_fabrics.title: Woven Fabric Types
woven_fabrics.description: At OZTAYTEKS, we lead the textile industry with our woven fabric collection produced at the highest quality standards. From classic weaving to modern techniques, we offer solutions for every need with our wide product range.

poplin.name: Poplin
poplin.desc: A classic woven fabric widely used for shirts and dresses with its thin, tightly woven and breathable structure.

gabardin.name: Gabardine
gabardin.desc: Professional fabric preferred in trousers, jackets and workwear with its diagonal weave, durable and full structure.

twill.name: Twill
twill.desc: Durable fabric used in trousers, coats and uniform production with its diagonal weave structure and wrinkle resistance.

saten.name: Satin
saten.desc: Elegant fabric preferred in evening wear, dresses and linings with its smooth and shiny surface and luxurious appearance.

oxford.name: Oxford
oxford.desc: Durable and classic-looking shirt fabric produced with basket weave technique.

vual.name: Voile
vual.desc: Fabric used in summer shirts and blouses with its very light, breathable and finely woven structure.

denim.name: Denim
denim.desc: Iconic fabric used in jeans and jacket production with its thick, durable and indigo-dyed structure.

flanel.name: Flannel
flanel.desc: Comfortable fabric preferred in shirt and pajama production with its soft, slightly fuzzy and warm structure.

keten.name: Linen
keten.desc: Premium fabric used in summer wear and home textiles with its natural fiber, breathable and cool properties.

sifon.name: Chiffon
sifon.desc: Elegant fabric used in dress and blouse production with its thin, semi-transparent and flowing structure.

tafta.name: Taffeta
tafta.desc: Luxury fabric used in evening wear and decorative textiles with its stiff, shiny and full stance.

kadife.name: Velvet
kadife.desc: Premium fabric preferred in jackets, dresses and upholstery with its pile surface, soft and luxurious feel.

krep.name: Crepe
krep.desc: Elegant fabric used in dress and tunic production with its slightly wrinkled surface and flowing structure.

panama.name: Panama
panama.desc: Durable fabric used in jackets and upholstery with its thick, open weave and durable structure.

kanvas.name: Canvas
kanvas.desc: Heavy-duty fabric preferred in bags, workwear and industrial use with its very durable, thick woven structure.

sambre.name: Chambray
sambre.desc: Comfortable fabric used in casual wear with its denim-like, lightly woven structure.

tencel.name: Tencel Woven
tencel.desc: Sustainable fabric preferred in premium clothing with its natural, eco-friendly and soft surface structure.

viskon.name: Viscose Woven
viskon.desc: Comfortable fabric used in dress and blouse production with its flowing, cool and soft touch structure.

polyester.name: Polyester Woven
polyester.desc: Functional fabric preferred in uniforms and workwear with its wrinkle-resistant, easy-care structure.

astar.name: Lining Fabrics
astar.desc: Practical fabric used in jacket, coat and dress inner surfaces with its thin, slippery and durable structure.

printing.title: Printing and Design Services
printing.subtitle: Bringing your creativity to life on fabric.
printing.description: Unlimited pattern designs and printing solutions on fabric.
printing.design_desc: Professional support in pattern studies and original creativity.
printing.flexible_desc: Flexibility to apply the customer's desired print on any fabric type.

gallery.title: Visual Journey
gallery.subtitle: Follow us on Instagram to see our latest productions and processes.

about_page.title: Turkey’s Reliable Fabric Solution Partner – OZTAYTEKS
about_page.intro: OZTAYTEKS is a deep-rooted professional textile company based in Istanbul, specializing in woven fabric production and wholesale supply. With our commitment to quality, trust, and continuity, we provide reliable fabric solutions to businesses both in Turkey and worldwide.
about_page.history_text: Operating in the sector since the 1990s, OZTAYTEKS has expanded its product portfolio over time, increased its production capacity, and adopted innovative production technologies by establishing digital printing infrastructure in its own facilities. Today, we serve a wide network of customers, primarily in Istanbul Osmanbey. This journey continues with a strict commitment to customer satisfaction and a constant quality improvement-oriented approach.
about_page.mission_text: To provide our business partners with high-quality, durable, and functional fabric solutions; and to make production processes fast, reliable, and consistent.
about_page.vision_text: To become a leading supplier in the textile industry; increasing reliability by establishing long-term collaborations with local and international brands and manufacturers.

values.quality: Quality: Production processes controlled at every stage
values.trust: Trust: Long-term relationships with our business partners
values.transparency: Transparency: Open communication and accurate information
values.flexibility: Flexibility: Rapid adaptation to customer demands

why_us_points: Years of expertise and industry knowledge
about_page.cta_title: Let Us Create Solutions for You
about_page.cta_text: We are here to create unique fabric solutions for every project and need. Contact us; let's plan the most suitable solution together with our expert team.

contact.title: Contact Information
contact.subtitle: We are here to serve you with our head office, branches, and factory.
contact.intro_subtitle: For questions, collaborations, and product inquiries, you can contact our team directly.

factory.title: Factory
factory.address: Feriköy Mahallesi, Bayır Sokak No: 32, Kurtuluş – Şişli / Istanbul

footer.description: The address of quality and trust in textiles since 1999. Shaping the fashion of tomorrow with modern production technologies.
